LanguageData.VPE_Skipdoor.label: skipdoor
LanguageData.VPE_Skipdoor.description: A psychic entry-point to a portal network.
LanguageData.VPE_IceCrystal.label: ice crystal
LanguageData.VPE_IceCrystal.description: A small crystal of ice that cools down the temperature in the room. Can help freeze perishable items.
LanguageData.VPE_IceWall.label: ice wall
LanguageData.VPE_IceWall.description: A fragile wall made of ice. It will melt in heat.
